title: Brian Bieza
text: Brian Bieza is a Graduate of California State University, Monterey Bay with a degree in Marine Science, as well as a certified AAUS science diver.

title: Brian Bieza
text:
Education
California State University Monterey Bay | Monterey Bay, CA
B.S. in Marine Science | 2024 -2026
Santa Barbara City College | Santa Barbara, CA AA in Biological Science |2015 - 2023

title: About
text: Hello, My name is Brian Bieza, Iâ€™m from Goleta, California and acquired my Bachelors degree at California State University Monterey Bay. Living along the coastline has fostered a love for the ocean and at 16 I acquired my open water scuba diving licence through University of California Santa Barbara (UCSB). This grew from a passion to something that I wanted to share with others which drove me to search for furthering this experience in diving up in Monterey Bay where I got my AAUS science diving certification. Ultimately I hope to share my love for the ocean with others and influence the next generation to value more sustainable practices as well as emphasise the importance of Science and knowledge.
